mapper.select: SELECT "order".ID, "order".ORDER_STATUS_ID, "order".CUSTOMER_NAME, "order".CUSTOMER_PHONE, "order".CUSTOMER_COMMENT, order_item.ID AS order_item_id, order_item.ORDER_ID, order_item.ITEM_NAME FROM "order" LEFT JOIN order_item on "order".ID = order_item.ORDER_ID WHERE "order".ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
